glass.name: Стеклянный эффект
glass.css: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);

flex_center.name: Flex по центру
flex_center.css: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;

flex_between.name: Flex между элементами
flex_between.css: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;

card_modern.name: Современная карточка
card_modern.css: background: white; border-radius: 15px; padding: 25px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .card-modern:hover { transform: translateY(-5px);

button_modern.name: Современная кнопка
button_modern.css: background: linear-gradient(45deg, #667eea, #764ba2); color: white; padding: 12px 30px; border: none; border-radius: 25px; font-weight: 600; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .button-modern:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(102,126,234,0.4);

section_hero.name: Героическая секция
section_hero.css: min-height: 100vh; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; text-align: center;

navbar_glass.name: Стеклянная навигация
navbar_glass.css: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2); position: fixed; top: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 1000;
